title: Hidden Player
description:
Description :
        Hidden playerUnable to do anything even after losing his loved one, Jun-hyeok meets the creator of the universe. "Do you want revenge? Then eat it." Jun-hyeok obtained the powerful hidden skill Saturation', which allows him to consume his opponent's ability and make it his own. He begins to write down a blo*** requiem. At the end, he doesn't even know what awaits him
